paper_title.en: Interaction of carriers with phonons in single- and poly-crystalline high Tc superconductors estimated from phonon thermal conductivity

description.en:
The interaction of holes with phonons around the transition temperature, Tc, in single- and poly-crystalline YBCO has been made clear, by comparing experimental results on the phonon thermal conductivity, K, versus temperature, T, with the Tewoldt-Wölkhausen (T-W) theory. The interaction coefficients for the directions parallel to ab-plane and c-axis (γab and γc, respectively) are evaluated from the K-T curves by using the T-W theory, which indicate γab &gt
 γc. The thermal conductivity in the poly-crystal versus T is calculated using different scattering coefficients of the single crystal, which is compared with experimental results. The thermal diffusivity versus temperature for a BiPbSrCaCuO single crystal for the c-axis direction is also measured and compared with that for a BiPbSrCaCuO poly-crystal.

paper_title.en: Effect of the Phonon Electron Interaction on Anisotropy in the Thermal conductine of YBCO Crystal
ANISOTROPIC THERMAL-DIFFUSIVITY IN CRYSTALLINE YBCO SUPERCONDUCTORS

description.en: The thermal diffusivity of crystalline YBCO for the vertical and parallel directions to c-axis has been measured to clarify the electron-phonon interaction below T-c, by using the transient method. From the diffusivity vs temperature, the scaled BCS gap and electron-phonon coupling strength are anisotropic.

work_title.ja: 情報処理論の教科書開発(共同研究)(平成6年4月26日つくばね社より発表予定)
財団法人 専修学校教育振興会の情報処理系専門学校部会において文部省より委嘱され「情報処理能力認定試験」の創設と実施の委員として研究した。
通産省 日本情報処理開発協会の中央情報教育研究所のCAI部会「CAROL委員会」の委員としてCAIの開発評価の研究をした。
